text: jo kujha dharati ate akasa vica hai, (uha) alaha da hai. Asim unham lokam nu adesa dita hai, jinham nu tuhade tom pahilam kitaba diti ga'i ate tuhanu vi, ki alaha tom daro. Jekara tusim na mani'a tam jihara kujha dharati ate akasam vica hai, uha alaha da hai. Alaha beni'aza ate sadaguna vala hai
